channel.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
channel.description:
Ask here for tips and tricks about this chapter. Tell where you're stuck and others will give the solutions.
[i](Please keep always on topic. Don't post about other chapters or create random chit-chat here)[/i]

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: imadoofus
item.description:
mersplosion:

There’s an open vent in the room at the end where you get the shotgun. I want to go inside. Not possible or am I just that inept at crouch-jump? I’m pretty sure it’s not possible. Anyone else?

Yeah, there’s another vent like it in Blast Pit. I guess from what you can see inside those vents, you don’t want to be climbing in. Vent-monster?

And I’m glad I’m not the only person here who uses the word “inept.”

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
It depends what door. However if I’m not mistaken, nearly all Tripmines in WGH (and most of the game for that matter) are avoidable by jumping (crouch jumping, a regular jump will not be enough to clear the mine’s beam) or crouching. Same goes for Sentry trip lasers.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Twick
item.description:
I’m long, LONG past this section by now, but for future reference…
Is there any way to get around the proximity mines by the fire doors without setting them off?
I’ve tried jumping, but the HEV suit seems to be much heavier in this version . I’ve also tried to jam them open with barrels, but the doors must be magnetic, for they fly away on contact. In one part I could use the conveyor belts to bypass the door, but that’s it.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
Found the problem, Malwarebytes’ Website Blocking was blocking me from the wiki all this time :meh:, turned it off and now it works, thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Did you try to clean your browser cache? The problem with the special characters in the wiki links has been solved a long time ago… maybe some old cookie or cache data is affecting your access.

You can try this also:

https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/WGH

(I created a shortcut for each chapter page using the chapter initials, to make search easier).

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
Really? I apologize, the wiki hasn’t worked for me since BM released, every time someone refers to something in the wiki my blood bubbles like cream soda

Read full topic

There’s a complete walkthrough of this chapter here:https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/We%27ve_Got_Hostiles

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Bjossi
item.description:
I was very disappointed by that invisible wall, to be honest. Would have loved if they added a side-path there for some optional goodies and/or combat.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: DreamSphinx
item.description:
mersplosion:

There’s an open vent in the room at the end where you get the shotgun. I want to go inside. Not possible or am I just that inept at crouch-jump? I’m pretty sure it’s not possible. Anyone else?

https://media2.tools4noobs.com/black-mesa/05-we-ve-got-hostiles/Black_Mesa_We_ve_Got_Hostiles_Screenshot_53.jpg

It’s impossible to go through there. Believe me, due to my memories of HL1 and coming out of that vent from the original, I thought there’d be something cool back there, and I’ve tried to get in there. Looks like there’s just an invisible wall there.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Thjazi
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Don’t go inside. You’ll die.

I never noticed the ladder before. Either way, it’s not meant to be used.

Next to the fire door, press the button with +USE to open it.

Wow I feel so dumb now, haha. Thanks so much though!

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?

I never noticed the ladder before. Either way, it’s not meant to be used.

Next to the fire door, press the button with +USE to open it.

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Thjazi
item.description:
I’m stuck at bm_c1a3a

1024×768 110 KB

I’ve tried running and jumping (both crouching and not), every single time I get to the ladder, my character doesn’t latch onto it. I’ve also tried running + jumping/crouch-jumping to the little ledge next to the ladder and haven’t had success with that. I’ve looked around the room and it doesn’t seem there’s any other way out.

EDIT: Image wasn’t showing up, fixed the link.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: LiqMat
item.description:
Yep. I am pretty much completely stuck here as well. Scientist runs under crate and stops, but soldier never comes out and elevator never appears. No way around this. Broken.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.description:
At least the player is in a position to empty the current pistol clip into that soldier’s brain before he can react.
It would have been cool and hilarious to be able to squish the guy.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
BaTz281:

I remember one of the Devs (Ram, I think) saying that they tried to make player interaction very intuitive, e.g. buttons you CAN’T push have RED lights and buttons you CAN push have GREEN lights, etc. That said…are you supposed to be able to push this button? To me, this looks like a game of “squish the soldier” but try as I might, no amount of “using” this button will drop the crane on his head. Also tried shooting the supporting cable - no dice.

Wishful thinking?

Yup, I tried that too. It’s remarkably counter-intuitive.

Read full topic

item.title: WE'VE GOT HOSTILES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Spudz
item.description:
Yeah, I thought the same thing, but after multiple tries assumed that it didn’t work. Seemed like the perfect set-up

Read full topic

To me, this looks like a game of “squish the soldier” but try as I might, no amount of “using” this button will drop the crane on his head. Also tried shooting the supporting cable - no dice.
